about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Connecting you to the magic of the big screen

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.subtitle: To enhance the movie experience for every cinema lover in Israel

about.intro: We believe the movie experience begins long before the lights go down in the theater. It starts the moment you wonder what to watch, get excited by a trailer, explore your favorite actors, and choose the perfect film for the night.
about.story: Our platform was created to solve a real need: a smart, modern space that brings together all movies currently showing in cinemas across Israel – from every theater chain, in every city, with full ticketing capabilities in one seamless, personalized experience.

discover.title: Discover Movies
discover.description: Find the latest movies now playing, with filters for genre, rating, cast, location, and more.

trailers.title: Watch Trailers
trailers.description: Watch high-quality trailers right from the movie page.

actors.title: Explore Actors
actors.description: Read in-depth actor bios, filmographies, photos, and details – all available in both Hebrew and English.

tickets.title: Purchase Tickets
tickets.description: Choose your preferred cinema and purchase tickets directly, without jumping between websites.

discounts.title: Use Discounts
discounts.description: Redeem all types of coupons, discounts, and loyalty program offers with ease.

responsive.title: Multi-device Experience
responsive.description: Enjoy a smooth experience on any device – mobile, tablet, or desktop – thanks to a fully responsive, user-first design.

partnerships.title: Our Partnerships
partnerships.description: We collaborate with cinema chains, film distributors, and ticketing providers to ensure that our data is always up to date, accurate, and comprehensive.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: Our vision is to become Israel's leading cinema discovery and ticketing platform – not just a place to buy tickets, but a cultural space that connects people to the magic of the big screen.

about.conclusion: Join us on a new kind of cinematic journey – where every movie begins with a truly great experience: yours.
